### [Contact Us](https://www.cityofpalmdaleca.gov/Directory.aspx)

1. #### Regular City Council Meetings
   
   **Physical Address**  
   Council Chambers  
   38300 Sierra Highway, Suite B  
   Palmdale, CA 93550
   
   Phone: 661-267-5115
   
   ### Office Hours
   
   Monday through Thursday  
   7:30 a.m. to 6 p.m.  
   *Closed Fridays*Â 
   
   ### Meetings
   
   **When:** First and third Tuesday of each month at 5 p.m., excluding January and July.
   
   When a regular City Council meeting falls on a national or state holiday and City offices are scheduled to be closed, the meeting is not held and is deemed adjourned for all purposes. All other Authority meetings are called as needed. For more information, view Palmdale Municipal Code Section 2.08.040.
   
   **Where:** Council Chamber  
   38300 Sierra Highway, Suite B  
   Palmdale, CA 93550
   
   [Agendas &amp; Minutes](https://www.cityofpalmdaleca.gov/310/City-Council-Meetings)

   Closed on Friday
